# Semi-Trailer Van Tender Notice

## Tender Announcement

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bidders to submit proposals for the procurement of semi-trailer vans for delivery to various Canadian Forces Bases (CFB).

### Tender Summary

We are seeking proposals for the delivery of sixteen (16) semi-trailer vans to various CFBs in Canada. The requested delivery date is 180 days after receipt of order (ARO). Additionally, an option for ten (10) semi-trailer vans is included for delivery within Canada. The Good(s) and Service(s) Identification Number (GSIN) for this procurement is 2330 (N2330B).

### Tender Process

This requirement uses electronic receipt of bids by email only. For details, please review the section entitled "Electronic Submission of Bids" in the solicitation document. Proposals must be submitted by email to:

DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

### Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Tender Status

The tender status is expired. The tender closing date was February 6, 2024, and the solicitation period is now closed.

### Correspondence

For information regarding this procurement, please contact:

Dong Le
Email: dong.le@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (999) 999-9999

Please note that the information provided is subject to change, and the DND reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Attachments:

* Amendment 001: [link]
* Amendment 002: [link]
* Original tender notice: [link]
